name: Citizen Development Centre (CD for Leprosy Persons, Handicapped & Women Welfare)
briefDescription: Citizen Development Centre (CDC) was started in the year 1997, works towards the welfare of Leprosy persons, Differently abled, Poor Destitute women & Downtrodden people. The society was started on the basis of " By the patients and for the patients ". Main aim of our society is to make "Disabled as Abled" through proper guidance , counseling & technical training. We strongly believe in providing Livelihood to the needy by improving their technical skills which helps them to increase their competency and become self sustainable.
